    Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).

    ImageOperation to adjust brightness and contrast of an image

    ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.

    ImageOperation to flip the image being displayed

    Using MeanFilter Code as a template to start the layout of the filter,
    ImageAction
    Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
    ImageOperation
    Interface for operations to be applied to images.
    ImagePanel
    UI display element for EditableImages.
    MeanFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
    MedianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Median (simple blur) filter.
    Resize
    ImageOperation to resize the currently displayed image
    Rotate
    ImageOperation to rotate the image being displayed
    SharpenFilter
    Image Operation to apply a Sharpness Filter.
    SoftBlur
    ImageOperation to apply a Soft (weak) blur filter.

    Actions provided by the View menu.
